category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_mass_deviation_xml_file
preference.preference_description: Specifies the path of the International Material Data System (IMDS) mass deviation values XML file. Following preferences can be created to specify OEM(Original Equipment Manufacturer) or organization-specific mass deviation values: * IMDS_mass_deviation_xml_file_OEM_n: Specifies the path of the IMDS mass deviation values XML file for an OEM with the specified IMDS Company ID (n). Here, n is an integer. * IMDS_mass_deviation_xml_file_orgunit_n: Specifies the path of the IMDS mass deviation values XML file for a specific IMDS organization unit (n). Here, n is an integer.
